message: I'm new to the HN scene, and have particularly enjoyed the group here on Convore. What's some advice that you would give to me, a young guy with lots of ideas for products, sites, and startups but also a lot of obligations such as work, a wife, and bills. Is it possible to balance all of that and still develop something great?

yes it is still possible, a lot of people have succeeded in doing that.. read a lot of posts of HN about it.. it's all about time management and understanding from your family and how you balance it all. read this post for example http://blog.jazzychad.net/2011/05/02/startups-are-hard.html
